subject: What is Ghost Boxology?
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I thought this might be a good time to coin these phrases.
Maybe a college will someday offer a degree in Ghost Boxology... :-)

Ghost Box-ology (Ghost Boxology) - The study of Ghost Boxes including 
the art/science of design, test, instruction, and performance.

Ghost Box-ologist (Ghost Boxologist) - One who practices the 
art/science of Ghost Boxology.

Thanks for helping to continue this art/science!

- Mike Coletta (UFO Geek)
Ghost Boxologist
http://www.ufomagazine.net
The other type of UFO
